thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners rival Chelsea in race to sign Celtic striker Moussa Dembele | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners rival Chelsea in race to sign Celtic striker Moussa Dembele | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners rival Chelsea in race to sign Celtic striker Moussa Dembele | Metro News
text:
Arsenal rival Chelsea in race to sign Celtic striker Moussa Dembele gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 10:34 pm Moussa Dembele has been in fantastic form for Celtic (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal are ready to rival London rivals Chelsea in the race to sign highly-rated Celtic striker Moussa Dembele, according to reports. 
The 20-year-old has been in scintillating form for the Scottish giants since signing from Fulham last year, scoring 26 goals in 40 appearances – including hat-tricks in his last two games. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
The French star was strongly linked with a move to Stamford Bridge during the January transfer window, with the Blues reportedly contacting Celtic to discuss a possible deal. 
He is set to be the subject of increased interest at the end of the season and The Sun say Arsene Wenger’s Arsenal hope to beat Chelsea to his signature. Chelsea fixtures 
Swansea (H) – Sat 25 Feb West Ham (A) – Mon 6 Mar Watford (H) – Mon 13 Mar Stoke (A) – Sat 18 Mar Crystal Palace (H) – Sat 1 Apr Manchester City (H) – Wed 5 Apr 
Brendan Rodgers is a huge admirer of Dembele and intends to put a hefty £40million price tag on his player’s head due to his stunning impact since leaving Championship outfit Fulham.
